subject: test to see if the output is a string or an interger
msgSnippet: Hi All, I have a string say, Str. What my program need to test is that the string which is returned is an alphabet . If the string is an integer it should
messageBody:
Hi All,
I have a string say, Str. What my program need to test
is that the string which is returned is an alphabet .
If the string is an integer it should throw out an
error.Is there any way i can use assertEquals or any
there test methods here.
Thanks for your help in advance.
Regards,
Vivek
